news.title: How Tim Cook convinced Trump to drop made-in-USA iPhone — for now
news.summary: Apple plans to spend about $600 billion over four years in the U.S. Apple CEO Tim Cook went to the White House to announce the plans.

news.title: Tesla exec leading development of chip tech and Dojo supercomputer is leaving company
news.summary: Pete Bannon, who joined Tesla from Apple in 2016, is leaving the electric vehicle maker. He will be replaced by Elon Musk, Tesla's co-founder and CEO.

news.title: Government-backed MP Materials surges as loss narrows on record rare earth oxide production
news.summary: MP Materials shares are rising after its financial results gave investors hope that the rare earth miner is moving toward profitability. MP Materials is a rare earth mining company.

news.title: Crocs CEO says consumer environment is 'concerning,' will reduce orders in the second half
news.summary: Shares of Crocs shed nearly 30% Thursday after the company issued the stark warnings. Crocs shares were down nearly 20% on Thursday morning.

news.title: OpenStore’s demise marks endgame for once-booming e-commerce aggregator market
news.summary: OpenStore is rebranding under its Jack Archer menswear label. The company shuttering many of the Shopify storefronts it acquired and laying off staffers.

news.title: ‘I’m scared to lose’: I have $140K in a 401(k) and earn $45K a year. Can I retire in 20 years?
news.summary: “My 401(k) retirement planner shows I’ll likely be short $1,500 every month during my retirement.”

news.title: ‘I have a great mortgage rate’: I need $80K to buy my husband out of our home. Do I raid my $180K Roth IRA?
news.summary: “I have two young children. I’m very proud of them,” she said. “I’ve always been proud of my children.”

news.title: Under Armour’s stock dives, as CEO doesn’t like what tariffs are doing to profits
news.summary: Under Armour's fiscal second quarter outlook fell below Wall Street’s expectations. The company again did not provide full-year outlooks.

news.title: U.S. Open prize money this year is the most ever given out at a tennis tournament: $90 million
news.summary: The men's and women's singles winners will each earn $5 million at the 2025 U.S. Open. The tournament will be held in New York City.

news.title: Wendy’s cuts profit outlook as U.S. sales stay weak. Its stock heads for a 5-year low.
news.summary: CEO Ken Cook said the company has “more work to do” to improve its U.S. business. Sales fell for a second straight quarter.
